knimeNode.name: POS tagger
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns part of speech tags to terms.

fullDescription.intro: This node assigns to each term of a document a part of speech (POS) tag. As tag set, the Penn Treebank tag set is used, for details see (http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~treebank). The underlying tagger model, which decides what tag to assign to which term is a model of the OpenNLP framework. OpenNLP is a natural language processing toolkit, see http://opennlp.sourceforge.net for details.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the documents to tag.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the tagged documents.
